  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x68
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x68
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x36
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x36 [color=#008000]
        LayoutBR {BR} at (0,0) size 0x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,18) size 166x18
          text run at (0,18) width 166: "This line should be green."
